T02D2782:150b-0: @150b * // dpal ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa'i gter la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2782:150b-2: sngags mthu ma grub grub pa dang //
T02D2782:150b-3: nyams chags gso ba'i cho ga ni //
T02D2782:150b-4: mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya //
T02D2782:150b-5: tha mal lus kyi snying 'dab dbus //
T02D2782:150b-6: phyogs kyi kha dog can h'um yig //
T02D2782:150b-7: rnal 'byor rgyal po rang sems gzhi//
T02D2782:150b-9: kha dang rna ba sna gnyis dang //
T02D2782:150b-10: mig gnyis bshang dang gci ba'i sgo //
T02D2782:150b-11: de bzhin rkang pa lag gnyis ni //
T02D2782:150b-12: gtso bo las spros rdo rje bdag / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02D2782:150b-14: nyi zla rdo rje hom khung zlum //
T02D2782:150b-15: rgya gram rdo rje rtse mang nyid //
T02D2782:150b-16: aa phreng ka phreng dkar dmar gyis //
T02D2782:150b-19: skyes pa'i sbyor ba yi dags bya //
T02D2782:150b-20: dam tshig rdo rje h'um yig las //
T02D2782:150b-21: ye shes dpal 'dzin bcu gnas ni //
T02D2782:150b-22: mchod sogs cho ga bzhin btud nas //
T02D2782:151a-0: @151a * // ting 'dzin sems dpa' rtse gcig bya //
T02D2782:151a-1: rnam par rtog pa kun shigs dang //
T02D2782:151a-2: ye shes phyag rgya mchog sbyor la //
T02D2782:151a-3: mnyam gzhag phrin las bcu lhag spyod //
T02D2782:151a-4: mkhas pas som nyi med par spyad //
T02D2782:151a-5: rtag tu sems can la phan dang //
T02D2782:151a-6: lhag pa'i lhas de de nyid shes //
T02D2782:151a-7: rnal 'byor cho ga la brtson pas //
T02D2782:151a-8: zla ba drug na rtags mthong 'gyur //
T02D2782:151a-9: lus nang me lce 'bar ba ltar tsha me 'od rnam par 'khrugs pa dang //
T02D2782:151a-10: rdo rje'i spu skyes kha nas me 'bar skye bo mang po'i mgo btud bstod //
T02D2782:151a-11: lag na rdo rje ral gri 'bar thogs ha la'i
T02D2782:151a-12: sgra sgrogs phyogs bcur rgyug / mig 'bras rab gsal
T02D2782:151a-13: sgron ma'i 'od 'char blo gros nye bar zhi ba'o
